com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.util

Class BitmapUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.util.BitmapUtils

  • public class BitmapUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Bitmap utility class which is used to load a Bitmap File into an ImageView with com.squareup.picasso.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yvgenij Sharovskij

      static void updatePhotoView(android.widget.ImageView imageView, java.io.File photoFile, java.lang.Boolean hideBgOnSuccess)

    • Method Detail

      • updatePhotoView

        public static void updatePhotoView(android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                   java.io.File photoFile,
                                   java.lang.Boolean hideBgOnSuccess)
        Updates the photo ImageView by setting the Bitmap file.
        Used in KanjiFragment and QNAonShowHintDialog.
        Parameters:
        imageView - an ImageView into which the Bitmap file is loaded using com.squareup.picasso
        photoFile - the photo File which holds the Bitmap pointer
